title: Track meals, scan foods, and more with Fooducate Pro, now under $50
content:
Macworld

Fad diets don’t work over the long haul, and restriction isn’t a healthy option for keeping weight stable and improving overall health. The best way to ensure you meet your health and wellness goals is to understand exactly what you’re ingesting and track meals mindfully.

Meet Fooducate, an app that promotes a more holistic approach to health and food. Lifetime access is now only $49.99 (reg. $149).

Fooducate starts by personalizing your specific weight loss needs and then calculates a target for your daily caloric intake. Even if you’re following a diet plan like low-carb, vegan, paleo, or keto, Fooducate tallies your calorie totals and logs your progress graphically so you can always see how your eating and exercise are helping you achieve your goals.

Using Fooducate’s food scanner, you can easily scan foods anywhere with the barcode scanner to view additional nutritional information and even find healthier alternatives. You can even discover dietary recommendations if you have diabetes, high cholesterol, a heart condition, etc. 

To stay motivated in their health quest, Fooducate members can also share their health journey and find inspiration from other members’ stories. Plus, you might discover health tips, new and delicious recipes, and more.

Upgrade your health and nutrition goals with a lifetime subscription to Fooducate Pro for just $49.99, the lowest price you’ll find online.
